text: Yasunari Kawabata (14 June 1899â€“16 April 1972) was a Japanese writer. He was the winner of the 1968 Nobel Prize in Literature.NobelPrize.org, "Yasunari Kawabata"; retrieved 2012-9-17. He was the first Japanese author to receive the award. ==Related pages == * List of Nobel Prize winners by country ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Writers from Osaka Category:Japanese Nobel Prize winners Category:University of Tokyo alumni
